Articles.Content:
I see a flat purple thing on my rocket

Edited December 13, 2020 by NateTheGreat

Could be that weird magenta square artifact that I’ve seen before, try updating your graphics drivers and if that doesn’t help reduce your graphics settings/remove some visual mods and see if it goes away.

What KSP version are you using and what mods do you have?

32 minutes ago, jimmymcgoochie said:

Could be that weird magenta square artifact that I’ve seen before, try updating your graphics drivers and if that doesn’t help reduce your graphics settings/remove some visual mods and see if it goes away.

What KSP version are you using and what mods do you have?

The magenta square artifact is caused by using a older version of PlanetShine. PlanetShine compiled for 1.8.1 and higher doesn't feature that magenta square.
